DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Effect Lumbosacral Plexus Blockade Versus Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: Patients total hip replacement randomize surgical anesthesia either lumbosacral plexus blockade continuous spinal anesthesia . All patient receive central venous , arterial spinal catheter . Hemodynamics monitor transpulmonary thermodilution pulse contour analysis . Perineural injection study medicine around lumbar sacral plexus perform guide ultrasound nerve stimulation . Study medicine inject divided dos spinal catheter . Treatment blind use double-dummy technique . After first intrathecal dose study medicine , hemodynamic response monitor 60 minute . Patients transfer operating room , total hip replacement perform lumbosacral plexus blockade spinal anesthesia accord randomization .
